MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:55 PM on Wednesday, 21 April 2021.
